text: Ezɨ Iesus men akam kamaghɨn a ikaragha ghaze, “Guizbangɨra, kɨ uabɨ uan arazibar gun mɨgei. Ezɨ nguibar kɨ dɨkavigha izezim, kɨ a gɨfo, egha danganir kɨ uamategh mangamim, kɨ a gɨfo. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, gumazamiziba nan akam nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an ikɨ. Ia nan Nguibam gɨfozir puvatɨ. Egha danganir kɨ gɨn mangamim, ia uaghan a gɨfozir puvatɨ.
